title: Ottawa continues to keep Canadians in the dark about potential impact of coronavirus - The Globe and Mail
description: The federal government is lagging some provinces and other countries on modelling that shows the best- and worst-case scenarios Canada faces in the COVID-19 pandemic
content:
People get exercise outside on the lake shore path along Lake Ontario in Toronto on Thursday. Health officials and the government have asked that people stay inside to help curb the spread of the coronavirus that causes COVID-19.
Nathan Denette/The Canadian … [+8441 chars]
